game.model

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.model.ChessPiece

  • public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    A class defining the different chess pieces and their corresponding integer and string.
    Author:
    Andreas Nylund, Hanna Granholm
